name: Wrath of Cod
description:
Wrath of Cod is a 2D, shoot-em-up, bullet hell game developed by a small team as part of a university project.

You play as the shark, an augmented beast with weaponry and equipment welded onto your body, fighting against diverse fauna in the deep ocean. Survive for as long as possible and try and earn points as you defeat the waves of enemies attacking you.

Key Features Include:

  • A Simplistic Customization System
    • Three Distinct Weapons
    • Three Special Abilities
    • Three Unique Play Styles Through Selecting DNA Traits
  • Amusing Enemy Design
  • Cool Artwork
  • Some Sort of Game Balance

Controls:

  • Left and Right Arrows to turn
  • Up Arrow to swim forward
  • "X" Key to fire your weapon
  • Space Key to use your ability
